title: Recycled Aluminum Market Set for $91 Billion Boom by 2032
description: The global aluminum recycling market is projected to reach $91.3 billion by 2032, driven by industrial efforts to cut energy costs, meet decarbonization...
content: The global aluminum recycling market is set for a substantial expansion, projected to reach $91.3 billion by 2032, as industrial consumers aggressively pursue low-carbon material sources to mitigate … [+4950 chars]
